related_post.text: So I have a login route and when the client posts a valid user name and password to the the `/login` then they should be redirected to the index `/` to display the actual page. However I don't have a post method exposed for the `/` route. So when I redirect them the method stays the same and they get a 405 from the server. Is there a way to redirect them and change the method to a GET? Or should I just accept POST requests on the `/` route to allow them in?

comments: Corrine asks question about 301 v 308 and Jkari provides answer
